channel.title: HElp with adding a command to 508!
channel.description: ok i would like to know how to add a command to 508. iv seen this done on other server iv asked bu they dont respond. dont mind my bad grammer. the command goes liek this: ::item (playername) (itemid) (amount). so what it does is it gives someone a item and the item id and amount. i hope u can help me with this command
